text: The expansion of private-sector involvement in Canadian public health care systems is a promising development. It's a win-win for patients and taxpayers alike. By leveraging the efficiency and expertise of the private sector, we can improve healthcare outcomes while reducing the burden on our overwhelmed public hospitals. The key, of course, is ensuring that these private clinics adhere to the same high standards of quality and accessibility as their public counterparts. The Canada Health Act must be upheld, and no one should be forced to pay out-of-pocket for medically necessary procedures. With careful oversight and a commitment to universal access, we can strike the right balance between public and private healthcare delivery." #healthcare #private sector
